certifications.title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect
certifications.description: Validates proficiency in designing distributed systems on AWS, following AWS architectural best practices.

certifications.title: Professional Scrum Master I
certifications.description: Demonstrates understanding of Scrum framework and ability to apply Scrum in the real world.

certifications.title: Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer
certifications.description: Validates expertise in designing, building, and maintaining data processing systems on Google Cloud.
